title: Pictet
body:
# Pictet

## The Task

Pictet Asset Management asked us to create an advertising campaign using their new branding to promote their Multi-Asset Portfolio Fund.

## The Solution

We developed a campaign which used 'Simple Objects' to convey Pictet's simple and effective approach to Multi-Asset investing.

## The Results

The 'Simple Objects' campaign increased awareness of Pictet's Multi-Asset Portfolio Fund and the online enhanced strong CTRs.
